questions.question: What is a virtual restaurant?
questions.answer: It is a virtual showcase that is present on delivery platforms (such as UberEats, Deliveroo, JustEat, or Lyveat) and allows you to display your menu to be visible to the largest audience.

questions.question: Why choose Light Kitch?
questions.answer:
Our team is composed of experts in the delivery of prepared meals.

By choosing our services, you will increase your revenue and generate new sales channels.

Thanks to Light Kitch's services in creating and managing virtual restaurants, restaurateurs will regain market share and bonuses on delivery applications.

Choosing us means letting us guide you in setting up a winning delivery strategy.

questions.question: How can I contact you?
questions.answer: You can send us an email at contact@lightkitch.fr or directly contact the CEO via the Whatsapp button at the bottom right of the page.

questions.question: Where can I share my suggestions and feedback?
questions.answer: Like with our partner restaurants, we pay special attention to everyone's opinions. We are here to listen to all remarks or questions. You can contact us via email at contact@lightkitch.fr.

questions.question: How can I join your team?
questions.answer:
We are open and interested in recruiting new talents in the Food-Tech sector.
If you are interested in joining the Light Kitch adventure, you can send us an email at contact@lightkitch.fr.

questions.question: How are partner restaurants compensated?
questions.answer: Partner restaurants are compensated based on their sales made through their virtual restaurants. They receive a single payment and a single detailed invoice, grouping all platforms and accounts created with Light Kitch.

questions.question: How can I reclaim my VAT with Light Kitch?
questions.answer: The VAT applied on delivery orders is deductible VAT. You can reclaim this VAT when closing your accounting period; it is calculated based on your delivery revenue and noted on the Light Kitch invoice.

questions.question: Do I need new ingredients for virtual restaurants?
questions.answer: No, we create new products with the ingredients you already have on site. You also do not need to purchase new production machines or change your raw materials to become our partners.
